body:
Comment 1: 
Running this in a little test program:

With len(woo) = 1000:
test.BenchmarkSimpleCheckBig	  500000	      3042 ns/op
test.BenchmarkSimpleCheckSmall	100000000	        21 ns/op

With len(woo) = 100:
test.BenchmarkSimpleCheckBig	 5000000	       333 ns/op
test.BenchmarkSimpleCheckSmall	100000000	        21 ns/op

With len(woo) = 10:
test.BenchmarkSimpleCheckBig	50000000	        63 ns/op
test.BenchmarkSimpleCheckSmall	100000000	        21 ns/op
_Labels changed: added **performance**._ _Owner changed to **k...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
